<script setup lang="ts">
import { AvatarRoot } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AvatarRoot
    :class="
      cn(
        'relative flex h-10 w-10 shrink-0 overflow-hidden border-3 border-foreground shadow-[4px_4px_0px_hsl(var(--shadow-color))] transition-all duration-200 hover:translate-x-[4px] hover:translate-y-[4px] hover:shadow-none',
        $props.class
      )
    "
  >
    <slot />
  </AvatarRoot>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { AvatarImage as AvatarImagePrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

const props = defineProps<{
  class?: string
  src?: string
  alt?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AvatarImagePrimitive
    :src="props.src ?? ''"
    :alt="props.alt"
    :class="cn('aspect-square h-full w-full object-cover', props.class)"
  />
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { AvatarFallback as AvatarFallbackPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
  delayMs?: number
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <AvatarFallbackPrimitive
    :delay-ms="delayMs"
    :class="
      cn(
        'flex h-full w-full items-center justify-center bg-primary text-primary-foreground font-bold uppercase',
        $props.class
      )
    "
  >
    <slot />
  </AvatarFallbackPrimitive>
</template>
